docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Simulation & Off-line programming
  • Supports KUKA, ABB, UR,
  • Customized robots
  • Multiple technology packages
  • Communication with KUKA & ABB

docs.title: About
docs.text: FURobot is a robot simulator and toolset from FabUnion.

docs.title: 特点
docs.text:
• 仿真 & 离线文件生成
  • 支持 KUKA, ABB, UR,
  • 自定义机器人
  • 支持多种工艺
  • KUKA & ABB 通信与控制
